cast.name: 唐·赫兹菲尔德 Don Hertzfeldt

awards:
第73届奥斯卡金像奖(2001)
　　最佳动画短片(提名) 唐·赫兹菲尔德

　　第29届动画安妮奖(2001)
　　最佳动画短片(提名) 唐·赫兹菲尔德

writer.name: 唐·赫兹菲尔德 Don Hertzfeldt

director.name: 唐·赫兹菲尔德 Don Hertzfeldt

introduction: 该短片曾获2001年奥斯卡最佳动画短片提名。Rejected is an animated short comedy film by Don Hertzfeldt that was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film in 2000. It received 27 awards from film festivals around the world.Rejected has a cult following and has grown into a pop culture icon that is frequently quoted or referenced. In 2009, it was the only short film named as one of the "Films of the Decade" by Salon.com  In 2010, it was noted as one of the five "most innovative animated films of the past ten years" by The Huffington Post.
